title: Business Case Kit
subtitle: Build a compelling business case for operational investments. Templates, frameworks, and ROI guidance.
whyMattersTitle: Why a Strong Business Case Matters
whyMattersDescription: Every operational investment should deliver measurable returns. This kit helps you:

benefits.benefit1: Calculate accurate ROI for operational improvements
benefits.benefit2: Identify both direct and indirect benefits
benefits.benefit3: Build compelling business cases for investments
benefits.benefit4: Track ROI over time and adjust strategies

calculation.title: ROI Calculation Framework
calculation.description: Learn how to calculate ROI for operational investments, including direct savings and indirect benefits.

measuring.title: Measuring Operational Impact
measuring.description: Understand how to quantify improvements in efficiency, quality, and governance maturity.

templates.title: Cost-Benefit Analysis Templates
templates.description: Ready-to-use templates for conducting comprehensive cost-benefit analyses.

caseStudies.title: ROI Case Studies
caseStudies.description: Real examples of ROI achieved by TwelfthKey clients across different industries.

calculateDescription: Use our free ROI calculator to estimate returns from operational investments.
